actions.message:
```

Help For CaiBot!

?help                   Lists available commands
?sendEmbed              Sends an embed message
?userInfo               Displays the user's information
?channelInfo            Displays the channel's information
?roleInfo [role-name]   Displays info for the role
?slap [@user]           Slaps the mentioned user
?flipCoin               Returns "Heads" or "Tails"
?genNumber [min] [max]  Returns a random number
?gold                   Display's the user's gold
?gamble                 The user randomly gains or loses some gold
?level                  To see your level
?rlevel                 Reset your level
?setnick                Give the bot a nickname
?getavatar              Get somewone avatar
?getusercard            Get somewone usercard

                       Minigames Commands
                                |
                                v
?deathbsettings help - Displays this help message with command information and usage  
?deathbsettings add - Starts a prompt where you can add your own events/actions onto the current deathbattle events/actions  
?peathbsettings list - Displays a lsit of deathbattle events/actions  
?deathbsettings remove {event/action} - Removes a certain action from the deathbattle events/actions  
?deathbsettings info [action/event] - Shows info for provided action/event
?inviteinfo [@player] or !inviteinfo - To check a player's invites 
?inviteclear - Clear a player's invites (Requires manage server permission to use)
?invitetop - Players with the most invites
?invitelk [invite code/invite link] - Gives information about the invite
?playerinvite [@player] - Shows what invite the player used to join the server
?tts [text] - Takes input of text and turns it into a mp3 speech file, sending it to the same channel
?ttsvc [text]- Takes input of text and turns it into a mp3 speech file, sending it to the same channel and then joining command author's vc to speak the message (The input has to have more than 47 characters)

```
actions.name: Send Message

```

Help For Administration from CaiBot!
```

=================================================================
```
-ban >> You Can Ban Somewone
-kick >> You Can Kick Somewone
-Mute >> You Can Mute Somewone
-unmute >> You can Unmute Somewone
-dnd >> Sets the bot status to Do Not Disturb
-away >> Sets the bot status to Away
-online >> Sets the bot status to online

```

actions.message:
- Deathbattle Settings Help -
`${tempVars("botPrefix")}deathbsettings help` - Displays this help message with command information and usage
`${tempVars("botPrefix")}deathbsettings add` - Starts a prompt where you can add your own events/actions onto the current deathbattle events/actions
`${tempVars("botPrefix")}deathbsettings list` - Displays a lsit of deathbattle events/actions
`${tempVars("botPrefix")}deathbsettings remove {event/action}` - Removes a certain action from the deathbattle events/actions
`${tempVars("botPrefix")}deathbsettings restore` - Restores the default deathbattle events/actions
`${tempVars("botPrefix")}deathbsettings info [action/event]` - Shows info for provided action/event
